import React,{useState,useContext} from 'react' import Nav from './Nav' import {Taka,Stars} from "./Components" import axios from 'axios' import Navigation from './Navigation-ash' import {useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' import Context from './Context' const Reviewer = () => { let location = useLocation() let data = location.state let context = useContext(Context) let id = context.user? context.user : null let userid = id.user_id console.log(id) let url2 = 'http://127.0.0.1:8000' let url = 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/addrev/' let [star,setStar] = useState(0) let [writing,setWriting]=useState('') let [img,setImg]=useState() let pk = data.id let sender = { userid:userid, pk:pk, writing:writing, img:img, star:star, } let HandlePost =()=>{ //axios function //productID,username,star,writing,images console.log(sender,'info') } console.log(data) console.log(star) return (

{data.name}

{data.story}

setWriting(e.target.value)} value={writing} placeholder="Write your own review" type="text" className="rev">
{setImg(e.target.files[0])}} type="file"/>
) } export default Reviewer
